name: Void (itch) (leo_calil)
description:
Void is a place between, and Souly is stuck there. He must escape to proceed, and you must help him before time runs out.

_____

A game developed by Leonardo Calil for "My First Game Jam: Summer 2021".  Hope you guys enjoy this first attempt at a Game Jam!

As I was afraid to run out of time, I decided to publish it to the Jam, while there are plans to updating and improving some features, such as:

Scene and Music Transitions;

SFX and VFX application;

Many assets I used are provided freely by the community and are credited in game.
